page.title: 10GOVERNMENT-DEMOCRATIC-FREE
page.content: {OUR AREA IS BUT A TINY PART OF THE {EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY BUT OUR {FARMERS ARE AFFECTED BY ITS LAWS. {WE,WITH OTHER AREAS ARE REPRESENTED BY {ONE MEMBER OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, {HE HAPPENS TO BE A DESCENDANT OF THE {DUKE OF WELLINGTON,DOURO BY NAME AFTER {SPANISHPORTUGUESE RIVER/PENINSULAR WAR CENTRAL GOVERNMENT WESTMINSTER,LONDON, WE ARE REPRESENTED BY 2 MPs AS THE CONSTITUENCY LINE PASSES THROUGH AREA, GIVES MUCH RESPONSIBILITY TO THE COUNTY COUNCILS AFTER THE LAWS HAVE BEEN PASSED.WE ARE IN COUNTY OF SURREY {SURREY COUNTY COUNCIL PASS MUCH WORK {TO THE DISTRICT COUNCILS. DISTRICT COUNCILS ARE MOLE VALLEY AND REIGATE AND BANSTEAD. {PARISH COUNCILS ARE LEIGH,BETCHWORTH & {BUCKLAND IN OUR MOLE VALLEY AREA; OTHER DISTRICT NOT DIVIDED INTO PARISH {MAJORITIES DO NOT OPPRESS MINORITIES.
